alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 9:47AM EST until January 16 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain may occur through the late morning hours. * WHERE...In South Carolina, Darlington, Marlboro and Dillon Counties. In North Carolina, Robeson and Bladen Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Some glazing on mainly elevated surfaces with total ice accumulation of less than one quarter of an inch. Bridges and overpasses may be briefly hazardous as well.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
